text: mosega baegseongdeul-iyeo neohuineun waenaleul haechilyeo haneunyo naega neohuie ge bonaeeojin hananim-ui seonjijaim-eulneohuineun alji anhneunyo lago geuui baegseong-ege malhayeoss-euna geudeul-eun oemyeonhayeossnani hananimkkeseo geudeul-ui ma-eum-eulbeos-eonage hayeossdoda sillo hananim-eunsaaghan baegseongdeul-eul indohaji ani hasinila
